conbody.p: Several new features and improvements have been introduced in version of the , some of which have implications for upgrading existing MFD template files.
If you are using , a new transformation scenario MFD upgrade has been added to streamline the upgrade process. See for more information.
Alternatively the distribution includes a Windows command line utility mfdupgrade.cmd which automates the upgrade process, see

Running the automated upgrade process on an MFD file filename.mfd results in a new MFD file filename_upgraded.mfd. Once you are happy with the results of the upgrade, this may be used in place of the original MFD file (but it is recommended that you make a backup copy first).
